channel.title: Im sorry everybody for everything I did in the past
channel.description:
I am truely sorry everybody , the people I was mean to...
Gikid.. Sorry I called you fat Mr.Chris.. sorry I called you dumb pko..sorry i called you a wanna be casey. .. sorry i called you a wanna be Therealjdb ... Sorry for thinking you are locking topics for fun and thinking that you cant handle mod , its just i was jelous .
Sorry to everybody elese also!!!!

item.title: Im sorry everybody for everything I did in the past
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:21, topic:133251”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=184507.msg1674353#msg1674353 date=1187126440]
Its supposed to be against the law in most/some country’s for under 13s to join online community’s like this for security reasons.
[/quote]
hey your rep is 13 o.0[/quote]

*ThugLife wonders how they let you use the internet, and whoever lets you use the internet, should be shot.

Read full topic

then technicly your not allowed on these forums.

Also this topic has gone on long enough i think.

Ye , they never say you must be 13+.[/quote]

We do, actually. Read the message given to you when you register, moron.

item.title: Im sorry everybody for everything I did in the past
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:13, topic:133251”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=184507.msg1672982#msg1672982 date=1187069105]

At least you’re apologizing

And regarding your sig, care to point me to one of those topics I’ve locked without reason? Or is it just propaganda?

I wouldn’t get worried about anything people post/have in sigs/say with regards to the job you’re doing. Most of the people that do complain are around the 12yr old age group, and are often completely oblivious to any reasoning you offer that suggests they were in the wrong.
[/quote]

And according to nohope’s profile, he’s 12! What a coincidence![/quote]Yes I am 12 , I turned 12 on march 30th . And my part was april 1st , Thats why I registered april 2nd. But I am not totally oblivious that I’m always right. That’s why I made this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry everybody for everything I did in the past
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

nohope:

Not that topic anyways.

Pretty sure that’s like the only topic besides moparscape ones that I’ve locked in this section, the majority of them were in questions. Anyhow I think you guys just are used to me yet, I’ll try to give more warnings and less locks, but remember I was selected for a reason, to help out. Sorry if I’ve pissed anyone else off.

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry everybody for everything I did in the past
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“therealjdb, post:4, topic:133251”][quote author=nohope link=topic=184507.msg1672300#msg1672300 date=1187048430]

At least you’re apologizing

And regarding your sig, care to point me to one of those topics I’ve locked without reason? Or is it just propaganda?
[/quote]I saw in the like the this section “I dont remember” And you locked it and and “no need for discussion”

I believe you’re talking about your topic that I locked, and as my post showed I had my reasons.

[quote author=therealjdb link=topic=184089.msg1670703#msg1670703 date=1186987723]
I suppose this should be locked because I can see a flame war developing. MITB shows no signs of closing down, so until this topic is neccessary there is no need for this, if you would like to have a serious discussion about this goto the Discussions and Debates section.
[/quote][/quote]Not that topic anyways.

Read full topic
